Summary: Since is was a little girl there have be many objects observed in my grandmas back yard, some so scary my grandpa and i would hurry into the house. when i was around 19, i woke up with 4 of (them) around my bed i could not speak or move for awhile.. ,
divs: Sighting DetailsWould rather not write to much more, It has always been my grandfather and I's secret. since his passing, i feel alone with this now. He always said... Don't tell your Grandmother:>) I think she already knows. I am telling my story now because i feel (them) now more than ever. Grandpa and I witnessed this because you were not allowed to smoke in the house. we would stand out back and watch the sky's every night.
